item.title: Teaching Machine Learning Online
item.description: Premise Traditional vs MOOCs Whatâ€™s this post about Designing the course Synchronus Vs Asynchronous Structuring your Contents Keys to success Structuring a course for online audience Evaluations Premise With the influx of many massive open online courses, learning has become barrier free. There is no reason to be not motivated these days when you hear that data science is the sexiest job in the 20th century.
